content: By now, you'll notice that the Loong bosses keep coming. You'll find yourself riding a giant turtle in Chapter 3, and launching into a boss fight. Face toward the water (away from the Keeper's Shrine) and go to the edge. You'll see a statue by the water, which will turn into Cyan Loong if you approach it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 3', specifically from the subsection 'Cyan Loong'.
The content is as follows:
By now, you'll notice that the Loong bosses keep coming. You'll find yourself riding a giant turtle in Chapter 3, and launching into a boss fight. Face toward the water (away from the Keeper's Shrine) and go to the edge. You'll see a statue by the water, which will turn into Cyan Loong if you approach it.
